questiontext.text: Scenario 1: You want to set up a virtual machine for a production email server. That means your virtual machines need to be seen from the internet. What network mode would you use for your Virtualbox VM? Give explanations.

Scenario 2: You want to set up a lab environment to measure the performance of a honeypot system. A honeypot is a network-attached system set up as a decoy to lure cyberattackers in order to learn the nature of the attack. You set up your laboratory scenario using virtualization environment. What network mode would you use for your Virtualbox VMs? Give explanations.

Scenario 3: You need a machine to analyse your data. You only need to access the machine from your local network. However you have to connect to the Internet to download all the data and tools. What network mode would you use for your Virtualbox VMs? Give explanations.
